Avalanche Rush.name: Avalanche Rush
Avalanche Rush.flavor: The mountain’s strength helps you shove an enemy from your path.
keywords: Personal   Trigger: You successfully bull rush a target.  Effect: You can increase the push by a number of squares up to your Constitution modifier, shifting into each square the target of your bull rush leaves.
Avalanche Rush.trigger: You successfully bull rush a target.
Avalanche Rush.effect: You can increase the push by a number of squares up to your Constitution modifier, shifting into each square the target of your bull rush leaves.

Dwarven Pride.name: Dwarven Pride
Dwarven Pride.flavor: No one shoves you around and gets away with it.
keywords: Personal   Trigger: You are pulled, pushed, or slid.  Effect: Until the end of your next turn, you gain a +1 power bonus to damage rolls for each square of the forced movement.
Dwarven Pride.trigger: You are pulled, pushed, or slid.
Dwarven Pride.effect: Until the end of your next turn, you gain a +1 power bonus to damage rolls for each square of the forced movement.

Stone Stubborn.name: Stone Stubborn
Stone Stubborn.flavor: You steel your mind to the onslaught, determined to go about your business.
keywords: Personal   Trigger: An effect would dominate or stun you.  Effect: You are dazed for the effect’s duration instead of being dominated or stunned.
Stone Stubborn.trigger: An effect would dominate or stun you.
Stone Stubborn.effect: You are dazed for the effect’s duration instead of being dominated or stunned.

Mountainborn Tenacity.name: Mountainborn Tenacity
Mountainborn Tenacity.flavor: Just as no mountain fell from a single strike, no dwarf has fallen from a single blow.
Mountainborn Tenacity.trigger: An attack drops you to 0 hit points or fewer.
Mountainborn Tenacity.effect: You can spend a healing surge. Until the end of your next turn, you gain resistance to all damage equal to twice your Constitution modifier.

Dwarven Resilience.name: Dwarven Resilience
keywords: Personal   Effect: You use your second wind.
